content: Daivame, ninte krpayum vaazhtthum nimittham ninakku sthuthi. Nyangalle theetti thrpthiyaakkiyathinaal ninakku sthuthi. Ninakkullllathil ninnu nyangall bhakshichu paanam cheythu jeevikkukayaal, ninte karunanimittham ninakku sthuthi. Ninne sthuthippaanum ninte ishdam cheyyaanum nyangalle yogyaraakkaname. (aammeen).
